Text: Wots the chances of episodes 38 thru to 48 being uploaded? Please!

Thanks v much TvTeam.

Like  "fredfl11" [at 2012-12-18 02:19], i would greatly appreciate it if episodes 38-48 were uploaded particularily  E47 - The Secret Drone War ...Please Please!!!!

Thanks again

When i played programme in the vlc player,Windows Media Player & GOM player, i noticed the audio out of sync slightly with video 
[ie.sound was slightly ahead of picture]

This may or may not  bother you, but if it does, i fixed it with a free downloadable tool called " Avidemux 2.6 (32-bit)" and set the audio "shift" to +220 and the sound is back in sync with video...

Hope this helps someone!!!!
